column5: Congrats to the both of you on your 50th Anniversary. Hope to be so lucky myself, just 40 more to go. Looked like the perfect way to celebrate! All the best and many more.  Sincerely, 1leg
thats is awesome!!!! not sure mine will put up with me for 50 years lol  cheers!

Thanks for the kind words.  I've shared your precious responses with family members.  Bly, thanks for the poem.  How special.  Johnny Bass, you picked a good day to be born.  Happy Birthday.  Our 50th was made better by all of you.  Connie
Congrats on 50 wonderful years and all the best to many more.
amazing.. congrats !!!
Congrats! Thats Awesome
Congratulations!  A very impressive milestone to celebrate with family & friends.  Mike

June 7, 1958   June 7, 2008 after 50 Golden Years   I was hoping to celebrate our 50th wedding anniversary with a shore lunch at Table Rock on Little Vermilion Lake, but my wife thought a small family gathering would be appropriate.  Our daughter and two sons insisted on having a bigger bash along Roaring River on my older son's farm in Tennessee.  It was a casual affair on a hot day, so shorts were part of my uniform.  Family members from Colorado, Illinois, Ohio, Tennessee and Washington D.C. joined us in what turned out to be a great weekend.  Here we are with our daughter and two sons.   My sons and brother join me for a shot.   The next day at our house with three generations including the two gals and the guy our children have brought into our family.   My talk came last.  After expressing love for my wife and children I announced plans for visiting my doctor to see about reversing a previous surgical procedure with intentions of increasing our family size.   Unfortunately I have additional obstacles that can't be reversed.   Many other friends joined us including two guys I coached in high school back around 1962.  A couple, who were with us for a seven week fishing trip to Ontario in 1960, delayed their annual season long trip to LOTW so they could join our celebration.  Norma and I are rich with family and friends.  It's been a great 50 years.

A half century of marriage Deserves a celebration; Your 50-year relationship Rates major acclamation!  Congratulations to you both On your durable rapport; Happy 50th anniversary, And may you have many more!

Well Congratulations to you both! That certainly is a milestone that is not easily achieved by very many! I would have to agree that you have been blessed with some wonderful children, grandchildren, and friends.
Congratulations Connie here's to many many more.
Congrats! Quite an accomplishment given todays marriage success rate... a fine lookin family I'm sure your proud of! Best wishes and fishes HH
That's fantastic Connie.  Congrats to you and your wife.  You have a beautiful family.  You must be proud.  Joey
Congratulations on 50 great years and best wishes for many more.

Hands down the best report submitted so far this year, Connie. Congrats to you, your lovely wife and handsome family. Thank you for showing some of us what dedication and loyalty is all about.  ps. You appear to have been sweating it at the mic. I guess that even thinking of sugical procedure in that area of the anatomy is enough to make the toughest men sweat.
Thats a great story TG and congratulations on 50 wonderful years and a good lookin family to go along with it.  Diane and I will join you in the 1/2 century club in another 8 years.
Congratulations Connie.  A wonderful accomplishment and a wonderful family to be proud of.
Congratulations! June 7 is a very special day. I was born on that day!
great report connie, looks like a wonderful family.you have almost 49 years to the day on me and steph.  congrats and heres to many more.  jason
Congratulations TG. 50 years is a long time for any respectable woman to put up with one of us. My wife thinks 40's an accomplishment for her.  JF
Wow.  What a heartwarming thing to read!  Congrats on 50 years....and for the great looking family that you have.  You have been truly blessed....something we all can hope to have as well.
Awesome Connie, thanks for sharing.
Excellent post TGuy.  Congrats on 50 years, that's awesome.  Looks like you have all the pieces of a perfect life and family dood.
Congradulations. You have a wonderful looking family.  It gives some of us just starting out (11 years) something to aspire to.
Congrats Connie!
Congratulations Connie.  Great post.
50 years........WOW.......that's amazing!!  Congrats!!  Sinker
Congrats, it looks like you have a great family there to be proud of!

Connie  Congratulations on Norma's induction into Sainthood.  She is by far one of the loveliest people I have ever fished with.  I wish we could join you on Table Rock.  Norton, Queenie, and Princess
So......I guess she's a keeper? Congratulations!
I knew you were special.  WoW 50 years! Congrats, great to still have family around after so long.  Hope you can go back and fish in Canada soon.

Well done Connie & Norma  Glad to hear the celebration was a success.  Give my best to Norma, hopefully one day I will be able to meet the better half and tell her in person. She must be someone special for you to have gotten married during the warm water season.  Here's to many more!  Cheers
